metadata.title: USN-3307-1 -- OpenLDAP vulnerability
metadata.description: Karsten Heymann discovered that OpenLDAP incorrectly handled certain search requests. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause slapd to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3307-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ldap-utils - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.4 libldap2-dev - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.4 libldap-2.4-2 - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.4 slapd-smbk5pwd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.4 slapd - 2.4.31-1+nmu2ubuntu8.4 No subscription required
